name: cssobj
description: Runtime stylesheet manager, turn CSS into dynamic JS module, pack CSS into MVC components, CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) of CSS in CSSOM, also solve common problems of CSS-in-JS, name space (local) class names, vendor prefix, media query hook, styled components

scripts.report: cd dist && gzip < cssobj.min.js > cssobj.min.gz && ls -lh && rm -f *.gz
scripts.build: git rev-parse HEAD > .commithash && rollup -c && uglifyjs dist/cssobj.iife.js -cm -o dist/cssobj.min.js

author: James Yang <jamesyang999@gmail.com>
